details.details:
*This model was not sold in the United States. It was sold in Canada, Mexico, Japan, and Saudi Arabia as well as the US possessions of Guam, Puerto Rico, and the USVI. Price varies by country, but in Canada, this specific iPhone 13 mini originally cost C$949, C$1089, and C$1359 with 128 GB, 256 GB, and 512 GB of storage, respectively. It also originally was offered for monthly payments of C$39.54, C$45.37, and C$56.62, respectively. Confusingly, Apple initially reported these numbers incorrectly as C$158.16, C$181.50, and C$226.50, respectively.

On September 7, 2022, Apple cut the price of this model to C$849, C$999, and C$1269, respectively, paid in full or C$35.37, C$41.62, and C$52.87 if paid monthly for two years.

In the US, to purchase a used iPhone 13 mini, visit site sponsor OWC for free shipping and current offers.

Photo Credit: Apple, Inc.
details.audio_support: Apple reports that the iPhone 13 mini supports "AAC‑LC, HE‑AAC, HE‑AAC v2, Protected AAC, MP3, Linear PCM, Apple Lossless, FLAC, Dolby Digital (AC‑3), Dolby Digital Plus (E‑AC‑3), Dolby Atmos, and Audible (formats 2, 3, 4, Audible Enhanced Audio, AAX, and AAX+)."
details.photo_support: Apple does not formally specify photo formats for the iPhone 13 mini. However, it can sync photos in JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, PSD (Mac only), and PNG formats.
details.video_support:
Apple reports that the iPhone 13 mini supports "HEVC, H.264, MPEG-4 Part 2, and Motion JPEG."

It also supports up to 4K HDR AirPlay for mirroring, photos and video out to the Apple TV 2nd Gen or later or AirPlay 2-enabled smart TV as well as video mirroring and video out "up to" 1080p through the Lightning Digital AV Adapter and the Lightning to VGA Adapter.
details.incl_accessories:
Ships with a Lightning to USB-C Cable. It does not ship with headphones or a USB Power Adapter.

In the US (and many other countries), site sponsor Other World Computing sells wireless headphones for this iPhone.

In the US, site sponsor Speck sells cases, sanitizers, and other accessories for this iPhone.

Also see: What is the best external keyboard for the iPhone?

details.details:
*This model was not sold in the United States. It is sold in Canada, Mexico, Japan, and Saudi Arabia as well as the US possessions of Guam, Puerto Rico, and the USVI. Price varied by country, but in Canada, this specific iPhone 13 originally cost C$1099, C$1239, and C$1509 with 128 GB, 256 GB, and 512 GB of storage, respectively. It also was offered originally for monthly payments of C$45.79, C$51.62, and C$62.87, respectively. Confusingly, Apple initially reported these numbers incorrectly as C$183.16, C$206.50, and C$251.50, respectively.

On September 7, 2022, Apple cut the price of this model to C$999, C$1149, and C$1419 paid in full or C$41.62, C$47.87, and C$59.12 if paid monthly for two years.

Finally, on September 12, 2023, Apple cut the price of this model to C$849, C$999, and C$1299 paid in full or C$38.39, C$45.17, and C$58.74 if paid monthly for two years. Discounts were available for trade-ins, as well.

details.details:
*This model is not sold in the mainland United States. It is sold in Canada, Mexico, Japan, and Saudi Arabia as well as the US possessions of Guam, Puerto Rico, and the USVI. Price varies by country, but in Canada, this specific iPhone 14 originally cost C$1099, C$1249, and C$1519 with 128 GB, 256 GB, and 512 GB of storage, respectively. It also originally was available financed over a two-year contract for C$45.79, C$52.04, and C$63.29 a month, respectively.

On September 12, 2023, Apple cut the price to C$999, C$1149, and C$1449 paid upfront or financed over a two-year contract for C$45.17, C$51.96, and C$65.52 a month.

Finally, on September 9, 2024, Apple cut the price to as little as C$849, C$999, and C$1299 paid upfront or financed over a two-year contract for C$38.39, C$45.17, and C$58.74 a month. Discounts are available for trade-ins, as well.

Photo Credit: Apple, Inc.
details.audio_support: Apple reports that the iPhone 14 supports "AAC, MP3, Apple Lossless, FLAC, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, and Dolby Atmos."
details.photo_support: Apple does not formally specify photo formats for the iPhone 14. However, it can sync photos in JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, PSD (Mac only), and PNG formats.
details.video_support:
Apple reports that the iPhone 14 supports "HEVC, H.264, and ProRes".

It also supports up to 4K HDR AirPlay for mirroring, photos and video out to the Apple TV 2nd Gen or later or AirPlay 2-enabled smart TV as well as video mirroring and video out "up to" 1080p through the Lightning Digital AV Adapter and the Lightning to VGA Adapter.
details.incl_accessories:
Ships with a Lightning to USB-C Cable. It does not ship with headphones or a USB Power Adapter.

In the US (and many other countries), site sponsor Other World Computing sells wireless headphones for this iPhone.

In the US, site sponsor Speck sells cases, sanitizers, and other accessories for this iPhone.

Also see: What is the best external keyboard for the iPhone?

Price varies by country, but in Canada, this specific iPhone 15 originally cost C$1129, C$1279, and C$1579 with 128 GB, 256 GB, and 512 GB of storage, respectively. It also originally was available financed over a two-year contract for C$51.05, C$57.83, and C$71.40 a month, respectively.

On September 9, 2024, Apple cut the price to C$999, C$1149, and C$1449 if paid upfront or financed over a two-year contract for C$45.17, C$51.96, and C$65.52 a month, respectively. Discounts are available for trade-ins, as well.

details.audio_support: Apple reports that the iPhone 15 supports "AAC, MP3, Apple Lossless, FLAC, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, and Dolby Atmos."

It also supports up to 4K HDR AirPlay for mirroring, photos and video out to the Apple TV 2nd Gen or later or AirPlay-enabled smart TV as well as video mirroring and video out "up to" 4K HDR through native DisplayPort output over USB-C or an USB-C Digital AV Adapter.

details.video_support:
Apple reports that the iPhone 16 Pro Max supports HEVC, H.264, AV1, and ProRes formats for video playback; the cameras record video in HEVC, H.264, and ProRes formats.

It also supports up to 4K HDR AirPlay for mirroring, photos and video out to the Apple TV 2nd Gen or later or AirPlay-enabled smart TV as well as video mirroring and video out "up to" 4K HDR through native DisplayPort output over USB-C or an USB-C Digital AV Adapter.
details.incl_accessories:
Ships with a USB-C charge cable (1 m). It does not ship with headphones or a USB Power Adapter.

In the US (and many other countries), site sponsor Other World Computing sells wireless headphones for this iPhone.

In the US, site sponsor Speck sells cases and other accessories for this iPhone.

Also see: What is the best external keyboard for the iPhone?
